media.caption: A robot thinking in front of a blackboard with complex equations written on it.

text.headline:
AI History
1950 - 2021
text.text: AI is revolutionazing a lot of domains and is a popular subject discussed in news and other medias. However, a long journey was needed for developing Machine Learning algorithms to this extent. This is a brief timeline of AI hisotry.

media.caption: Alan Turing at the age of 16.

text.headline: Mind: Computing Machinery and Intelligence
text.text: A paper written by Alan Turing in the magazine Mind in which he addressed the problem of artificial intelligence, and proposed an experiment that became known as the Turing test, an attempt to define a standard for a machine to be called intelligent

media.caption: Marvin Minsky and Claude Shannon at the Dartmouth conference, United States

text.headline: Mind: Computing Machinery and Intelligence
text.text: The Dartmouth Summer Research Project on artificial intelligence was a seminal event for artificial intelligence as a field, it is considered as the starting point of Artificial Intelligence as an autonomous research domain. John Mc Carthy presented his search algorithm Alpha-beta pruning, an evaluating algorithm having a primary purpose in artificial intelligence programming, specifically for the majority of chess programs

media.caption: Marvin Minsky and Claude Shannon at the Dartmouth conference, United States
